QuestData.Title: Improved Quality
QuestData.Description: I'm a bit confused. The Rage Scar yeti used to be the finest source of leather in these lands... but these pelts are weak and even rotted in spots. Some sort of illness must be plaguing the creatures.$B$BI'll have to rely on a different source. The yeti of Feral Scar Vale to the south have hides nearly as strong. They are also a great deal fiercer; do not hunt them without caution, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Feral Scar Yeti Hides from Feral Scar Yeti.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are the Feral Scar yeti still there? Did you get the leather?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent, excellent! These are going to work out incredibly well - I can already tell that they're going to be much harder when properly cured.$B$BThanks again for your aid, $n. Here - please take one of my latest creations.
